metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5752 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When installing a package from a Mercurial VCS URL (ie "pip install hg+...") with pip prior to v23.3, the specified Mercurial revision could be used to inject arbitrary configuration options to the "hg clone" call (ie "--config"). Controlling the Mercurial configuration can modify how and which repository is installed. This vulnerability does not affect users who aren't installing from Mercurial.

criterions.comment: python-pip package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
